documentation.title: Array Multiple Statement Alignment
documentation.standard: When declaring arrays, there should be one space on either side of a double arrow operator used to assign a value to a key.

code.title: Valid: correct spacing between the key and value.
Invalid: No or incorrect spacing between the key and value.

documentation.standard: In the case of a block of related assignments, it is recommended to align the arrows to promote readability.

code.title: Invalid: Not aligned; harder to read
